name: Vampless
description:
Description

You play as a vampire that was poisoned with a plague. Now his bloodlust is immense and if he will stop drinking blood he will die a painful death. Its obvious the plague was created made by their rivals - the Headless. Find infromation and the cure in their quaters. Drink their blood to hold your bloodlust but be careful - the Headless are dangerous.

Controls

WASD, Space - movement

Q - transform to bat/vampire

E - interact; drink blood when you are behind enemy

To skip text in intro - press Enter.

To finish the level kill all enemies and walk to the right edge of the screen.

The story text is in russian.

This is the very first game I made. Made in two weeks for UralGameJam3. A bit unfinished.
